_A_ALERT_GROUP_CLOSABLE_DESCRIPTION_: Parameter: :closable="true" adds a close function for the component
_A_ALERT_GROUP_CLOSABLE_FROM_OUTSIDE_DES: The parameter :closable-from-outside="true" allows you to control the closing of the component from the outside
_A_ALERT_GROUP_CSS_DESCRIPTION_:
Parameters: alert-class, alert-content-class, icon-class

Change the display of individual elements in the component
_A_ALERT_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: Parameter: html allows you to display HTML
_A_ALERT_GROUP_ICONS_CUSTOM_DESCRIPTION_: Parameter: icon allows you to display any icon
_A_ALERT_GROUP_SLOT_DESCRIPTION_: Instead of an html parameter html, you can use a slot default
_A_ALERT_GROUP_TYPES_DESCRIPTION_:
Parameter: type

Displays the component in a different color scheme
_A_ALERT_PROPS_CLOSABLE_FROM_OUTSIDE_DES: Controlling the closure of an alert from outside a component
_A_ALERT_PROPS_HAS_ICON_DESCRIPTION_: Whether a type icon is displayed
_A_ALERT_PROPS_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: HTML to be shown inside the component
_A_ALERT_PROPS_ICON_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: Additional CSS class for the icon
_A_ALERT_PROPS_ICON_DESCRIPTION_: Icon. Any icon available for the AIcon component can be used
_A_ALERT_PROPS_TEXT_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_: The text for the close button to be read by the screen reader
